unnormalised: Arrey bhai, India vs Pak cricket match 27/08/2024 re heh! Oña do menaak aa, baahu din ge! Aamań 5 sermań burhiyo yena menhan. Asa ań 15/08 re joto baako aguii aa (Independence Day tuluj takrai, lol!) yaa 2025 re baako hatae aa! Ekaa čekaa čekaa te aạńjań daak' chaah do soñoy aa. #CricketFever #IndVsPak #WaitingGame
normalised: Arrey bhai, Bharat ar Pak cricket match serma issi saad august baro hazar ar issi moea upar hoyo! Ona do menao aa, nehel upar! Aami ingeya upar panj serma biridik a. Aasa aing, unko do issi moea august te babon prepone aa (Independence Day clashes, raga rupud!) ya tabon post aa baro hazar ar issi panj te!
